tool_description: An API showing all the latest happenings in the world of Wild all around the globe.
name: Wildlife Live
title: Wildlife Live

api_list.name: Get All Wild-life News
api_list.description: This endpoint will redirect to all the news related to wild and their world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wildlife-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wildlife-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get individual source news
api_list.description: Retrieve the news related to the world of wild from specific source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wildlife-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/independent"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wildlife-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wildlife-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wildlife-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
